page.title: 10 EDUCATION
page.content: There are two primary schools in this block.Both schools are situated in the village of Gortin.There are no secondary or grammer schools in the area. {Saint Patrick's Maintained School}is the bigger of the two.There are five teachers in it.There are 131 children on roll.This school is situated beside Main Street.The other school is called{Gortin Controlled Primary School.It is a three teacher school with about 70 children on roll.This school is situated beside the Plumbridge Road. When the children leave Primary they either go to the grammer or secondary schools in Omagh or to{St.Joeseph's Secondary School}in Plumbridge. Western Area Board buses take many of the children to school.
